Grid

2D array of numbers (like a black and white image).  Each grid occupies whole map and starts at [0, 0].

Authors: Sparker(initial author), Sen(code porting)

Functions
new

Constructor

Parameters: _cellSize

_cellSize

cell size in meters. Each cell is square. And flat.

getGridArray

Returns the underlying 2D array.

Returns: Array

getCellSize

Returns cell size of this grid.

Returns: Number

setValueAll

Sets all elements to constant value

Parameters: _value

_value

Number

Returns: nil

setValue

Sets value of element specified by world coordinates

Parameters: _pos, _value

_pos

array, position: [x, y] or [x, y, z], but only x and y matter.

_value

Number

Returns: nil

addValue

Adds value to element specified by world coordinates

Parameters: _pos, _value

_pos

array, position: [x, y] or [x, y, z], but only x and y matter.

_value

Number

Returns: new value of the element.

getValue

Gets value of the element specified by world coordinates

Parameters: _pos

_pos

array, position: [x, y] or [x, y, z], but only x and y matter.

Returns: Number, value of the element.

getMaxValueCircle

Gets max value found within the circle

Parameters: _center, _radius

_center

array, position: [x, y] or [x, y, z], but only x and y matter.

_radius

number, radius of the circle

Returns: Number or Array, max value found within the circle

getValueCircleSum

Gets total value found within the circle

Parameters: _center, _radius

_center

array, position: [x, y] or [x, y, z], but only x and y matter.

_radius

number, radius of the circle

Returns: Number or Array, total value found within the circle

filter

Filters the grid through a kernel (2D array).

Parameters: _kernel

_kernel

square 2D array with numbers (coefficients). Size should be odd.

Returns: Nothing

plot

Plots the grid on the map.

Parameters: _scale

_scale

value which will result to alpha 1.0.

_plotZero

bool, optional, default false. If true, zero values will be plotted as green squares.

_brush

brush to use when drawing, default "SolidFull"

_colors

array[3], optional, default ["ColorGreen", "ColorRed", "ColorBlue"]. Colors to use for zero, positive and negative respectively

Returns: nil

unplot

Removes markers of a previously plotted grid

Returns: nil

plotCell

Plots a single cell of a grid

Parameters: _pos

_pos

[x, y] position, in meters

Returns: nil

copyFrom

Sets values to this grid from another grid.

Parameters: _grid

_grid

the Grid to copy from

Returns: reference to this grid.
